name: AgentWard Sanitize
tagline: Detect and redact PII from text files — 15 categories, zero dependencies.
description: Scans files for personally identifiable information (PII) including credit cards, SSNs, emails, phone numbers, API keys, addresses, medical license numbers, insurance IDs, and more. Replaces each instance with a numbered placeholder. All processing is local — no data leaves your machine.
